> = **[[span class="member"]]You[[/span]] have joined #site19**
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] homk homk which of u sussy bakas did this??
> [[span class="ping"]]**<ham>:**[[/span]] Yo swag. Did what?
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-art-of-swaghetti
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member"]] **Swaghetti**:[[/span]] you made an art page?
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] nice
>
> = [[span class="member3"]]**Meta[[/span]] has joined.**
>
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member2"]]**tootmaster69**:[[/span]] I don't remember! Also, theres a shitty IRC chatbox quoting us, inside the article.
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>:**[[/span]] Smh not this again
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member3"]] **Meta**:[[/span]] Hey! welcome back <3
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>:**[[/span]] hey [[span class="member2"]]**tootmaster69**[[/span]] <3 i was summoned
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>**:[[/span]] tbh swag, you're kinda overusing me.
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] huh? 
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member3"]] **Meta**:[[/span]] I agree
> [[span class="ping"]]**<ham>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member"]]**Swaghetti**:[[/span]] Same
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>:**[[/span]] Yeah bro, you already have an [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/swaghetti-s-arthur-page |Author Page]]] with this whole meta mechanic.
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING
> [[span class="ping"]]**<ham>:**[[/span]] Lol 
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] Lol chill
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] Bruh you're arguing with yourself
> [[span class="ping"]]**<ham>:**[[/span]] On a chat module you wrote YOURSELF
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>:**[[/span]] With throwaway IRC characters you just made up BY YOURSELF.. I wouldn't trust your dumbass either.
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] ... is the art at least good?
> [[span class="member2"]]**<tootmaster69>:**[[/span]] meh
> [[span class="member3"]]**<Meta>:**[[/span]] I am literally not real
> [[span class="ping"]]**<ham>:**[[/span]] [[span class="member"]]**Swaghetti**:[[/span]] Ehhh its okay
> [[span class="member"]]**<Swaghetti>:**[[/span]] Lol fuck off
author: Swaghetti
